entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash on shell navigation for Mac Catalyst #29297
  • WebP support for resizetizer #29296
  • Maui IOS System.NullReferenceException - Arg_NullReferenceException #29294
  • MAUI Android System_InvalidOperationException_Window was already activated #29293
  • MAUI Android System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException - ArgumentOutOfRange_IndexMustBeLess #29292
  • MAUI Android System.InvalidOperationException: InvalidOperation_EnumFailedVersion #29291
  • I1_Vertical_list_for_Multiple_Rows - Rotating the emulator would cause text to overflow. #29287

Closed

  • Editor with AutoSize=EditorAutoSizeOption.TextChanges bad performance on iOS #27698
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • .NET MAUI Problem with rendering ListView/CollectionView on Android #12070
    Backlog
  • Unable to Launch IOS app into iphone. #29290
  • IsVisible being explicitly set in construction, then changed through binding later doesn't respect the later state #29060
  • Issue with input type number in Blazor hybrid app #29115
  • .Net 9 Blazor compilation fail for Conflicting assets #29114
  • Issue with .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid MSIX Installation – Missing Executable #29119
  • .NET 9 Maui Hybrid Web Template cannot handle page refreshes (InvalidOperationException: Cannot provide a value for property 'Http' on type 'MauiApp1) #29116

PullRequests

Created

  • XAML xmlns simplifications #29298
  • [Windows] Fix for Assigning null to the SelectedItem of the CollectionView in the SelectionChanged event does not clear the selection #29288
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for CarouselView IsSwipeEnabled=False Prevents Visual Navigation #29286
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [net10.0] Merge main net10 #29273
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [net10.0] Update preview4 dotnet #29254
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [NET10.0] Annotate converters for nullability 2/n #29276
    community ✨

Updated

  • Add the ability to intercept all web resource requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [iOS]Fix: FlyoutPage memory leak #28769
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] SpacingItemDecoration improvement #27093
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Fixed the flyout icon and content page disappeared when focus on the shell search handler #28474
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Remove Compatibility.Layout as a subclass of all modern .NET MAUI controls #29281
    t/breaking 💥, area-layout, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [Android] Fixed Setting a Label visible after having had focus on a InputView will increase the Label's height #29210
    p/0, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/04/28] Candidate - In Flight Branch #29158
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar Black Background Issue When Setting Transparent Background #29225
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] - Fix KeepScrollOffset Behavior During Dynamic Item Additions in CollectionView #29255
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android & iOS]Make SearchHandler's Focus() and Unfocus() work #29278
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for First Item in CollectionView Overlaps in FlyoutPage.Flyout on iOS #29265
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for ImagePaint Not rendering in View #29205
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Implemented the Resize and Downsize functions in the W2DImage class #29138
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows]Fix NullReferenceException in OpenReadAsync for FileResult created with full path #28238
    platform/windows 🪟, area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Flyout title is not broken over multiple lines when you rotate your screen. #29171
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed Shell flyout background image does not displayed #28977
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Controls Disappear When WebView is Used with Hardware Acceleration Disabled #28934
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed Horizontal Spacing for Horizontal List #28311
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Path Rendering Issue Inside StackLayout When Margin Is Set #28071
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the picker items do not appear when tapping on the picker after navigating through PushModalAsync #28003
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed TransformProperties issue when a wrapper view is present #29228
    area-animation, platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Incorrect Window.Y and Window.Height values when closing a maximized window #29253
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix CarouselView EmptyView display when filtering to zero items #29247
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Shell] Changed TitleProperty From TwoWay to OneWay #29280
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Indicator View Causing Looping Issue with CarouselView #27880
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
